name: Elements Of Soul
description:
Ying and Yang are taking care of the Sanctuary that balances the entire universe. Inside, there are the 5 vital elements of life, until suddenly everything begins to change and the Sanctuary begins to collapse. The 5 elements that give balance to life are no longer, you do not find them and your duty is to seek them to return balance the world.

Delve into Chinese philosophy and save the world.

A Game developed in 1 week by:

Gael Trevino - Programmer

Wess - Programmer

Panchis - Artist and Animator

Gus - Artist

Leo - Artist
